alert.note: Alert for Snohomish (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 12 at 6:34AM PST until January 13 at 4:28AM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Seattle WA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Washington... Skykomish River Near Gold Bar affecting Snohomish County. .Heavy rain over the Central Cascades will come to an end this afternoon. The heavy rain will push the Skykomish River near Gold Bar above flood stage this morning. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Skykomish River Near Gold Bar. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, the Skykomish River will cause minor flooding of low pasture lands and low lying roads...including Index-Galena Rd and Tualco Loop Rd. A stage of 15 feet on the Skykomish River corresponds to a Phase 2 in the Snohomish County flood program. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:30 AM PST Wednesday the stage was 14.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 15.4 feet late this morning. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by this afternoon at 245 PM PST.
